Template.HtmlPart:
Hi {{applicantName}},

{{daoName}} is inviting applications for their new grant titled {{grantName}}. You can view the grant details {{grantLink}}. To apply to this grant, click Apply Now or visit {{faqLink}} if you have any questions. You can reach out to us at questbook.app@gmail.com or message us on our {{discordServerLink}}. Wishing you the best for your application!

Best,
Team Questbook
